name: Barji VS PolyMars Pack 1
description:
This pack is the result of PolyMars and Barji's two $1000 game making competitions. 

2 Python Games, 10 Hours, $1000.

These two games were made in 10 hours in Python using Pygame. 

two birds, one stone, PolyMars

Use your trusty slingshot to knock birds off of power lines! But beware, you only have one rock per level...

BuckShot, by Barji

Use your shotgun to move around, don't run out of ammo.

Watch the Python competition soon.

2 C++ Games, 10 Hours, $1000.

These two games were made in 10 hours in C++ using raylib.

Digmoid Drift, PolyMars

Place planets of different sizes to pull an alien to his home!

uufo, by Barji

uufo. that's all

Watch the C++  competition here.
